Henrique de Medeiros Kawakami

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/2553750297638394
  • Última atualização do currículo em 19/10/2016

Possui graduação em Engenharia Elétrica pela Universidade Estadual de Campinas (2004). Atualmente é mestrando em Segurança da Informação. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Produção bibliográfica
Trabalhos completos publicados em anais de congressos
1.
KAWAKAMI, HENRIQUE; OTT, DAVID ; WONG, HAO-CHI ; DAHAB, RICARDO ; GALLO, ROBERTO . ACBuilder: A tool for hardware architecture security evaluation. In: 2016 IEEE International Symposium on Hardware Oriented Security and Trust (HOST), 2016, McLean. 2016 IEEE International Symposium on Hardware Oriented Security and Trust (HOST), 2016. p. 97.

2.
KAWAKAMI, HENRIQUE; GALLO, ROBERTO ; DAHAB, RICARDO ; NASCIMENTO, ERICK . Hardware Security Evaluation Using Assurance Case Models. In: 2015 10th International Conference on Availability, Reliability and Security (ARES), 2015, Toulouse. 2015 10th International Conference on Availability, Reliability and Security. p. 193.

3.
GALLO, ROBERTO ; HONGO, PATRICIA ; DAHAB, RICARDO ; NAVARRO, LUIZ C. ; KAWAKAMI, HENRIQUE ; GALVÃO, KAIO ; JUNQUEIRA, GLAUBER ; RIBEIRO, LUANDER . Security and system architecture: comparison of Android customizations. In: the 8th ACM Conference, 2015, New York. Proceedings of the 8th ACM Conference on Security & Privacy in Wireless and Mobile Networks - WiSec '15, 2015. p. 1.

4.
GALLO, ROBERTO ; KAWAKAMI, HENRIQUE ; DAHAB, RICARDO . Case Study: On the Security of Key Storage on PCs. In: 2013 12th IEEE International Conference on Trust, Security and Privacy in Computing and Communications (TrustCom), 2013, Melbourne. 2013 12th IEEE International Conference on Trust, Security and Privacy in Computing and Communications, 2013. p. 1645.

5.
GALLO FILHO, R. A. ; KAWAKAMI, H. M. ; DAHAB, R. . FORTUNA - A Probabilistic Framework for Early Design Stages of Hardware-Based Secure Systems. In: 5th International Conference on Network and System Security (NSS 2011), 2011, Milão. Proceedings of NSS 2011, 2011.

6.
GALLO FILHO, R. A. ; KAWAKAMI, H. M. ; DAHAB, R. . SCuP - Secure Cryptographic Microprocessor. In: XI Simpósio Brasileiro em Segurança da Informação e de Sistemas Computacionais (SBSeg 2011), 2011, Brasília. Anais do XI Simpósio Brasileiro em Segurança da Informação e de Sistemas Computacionais (SBSeg 2011), 2011.

7.
GALLO FILHO, R. A. ; KAWAKAMI, H. M. ; DAHAB, R. ; ARAUJO, G. ; AZEVEDO, R. . T-DRE: A Hardware Trusted Computing Base for Direct Recording Electronic Vote Machines. In: 2010 Annual Computer Security Applications Conference, 2010, Austin. Proceedings ACSAC 2010, 2010.

8.
GALLO FILHO, R. A. ; KAWAKAMI, H. M. ; DAHAB, R. . On Device Identity Establishment and Verification. In: EuroPKI 2009 - Sixth European Workshop on Public Key Services, Applications and Infrastructures, 2009, Pisa. Proceedings of EuroPKI 2009, 2009.
